revision.text: ==Pipil== ===Alternative forms=== * {{qualifier|shortened}} [[yemet#Pipil|yēmet]] ===Pronunciation=== * {{a|Standard}} {{IPA|ppl|/jeˈhemet/}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|ppl|pronoun}} # {{lb|ppl|personal}} [[they]], third person plural pronoun. #: '''''Yejemet''' [[tamachtiani#Pipil|tamachtianimet]] [[katka#Pipil|katka]]'' #:: '''''They''' were teachers'' ====See also==== {{ppl-personal pronouns}} * {{l|ppl|kin-}} (''object marker'') * {{l|ppl|-t}} (''plural verb suffix'')
